abilities.name: Damage Swap
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to another as long as you don't Knock Out that Pokémon. This power can't be used if Alakazam is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Freeze Dry
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. If tails, this attack does 10 damage to each of your own Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Energy Burn
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may turn all Energy attached to Charizard into Fire Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can't be used if Charizard is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Hydrocannon
attacks.text: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Dark Blastoise but not used to pay for this attack. You can't add more than 40 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Rocket Tackle
attacks.text: Dark Blastoise does 10 damage to itself. Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Dark Blastoise during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

abilities.name: Summon Minions
abilities.text: When you play Dark Dragonite from your hand, search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Giant Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Fascinate
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch it with the Defending Pokémon. This attack can't be used if your opponent has no Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Poison Claws
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Surprise Thunder
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, flip another coin. If the second coin is heads, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. If the second coin is tails, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.text: Whenever your opponent's attack damages Machamp (even if Machamp is Knocked Out), this power does 10 damage to the attacking Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.) This power can't be used if Machamp is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed when your opponent attacks.

abilities.name: Toxic Gas
abilities.text: Ignore all Pokémon Powers other than Toxic Gases. This power stops working while Muk is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

abilities.name: Energy Trans
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may take 1 Grass Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon and attach it to a different one. This power can't be used if Venusaur is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

name: Full Heal Energy
rules: If you play this card from your hand, the Pokémon you attach it to is no longer Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned.Full Heal Energy provides Colorless energy. (Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.)

name: Potion Energy
rules: If you play this card from your hand, remove 1 damage counter from the Pokémon you attach it to, if it has any.Potion Energy provides Colorless energy. (Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.)

name: Pokémon Breeder
rules: Draw 2 cards and heal 20 damage from your Active Pokémon. If you have no cards in your deck, you can't play this card.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Pokémon Trader
rules: Trade 1 of the Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards in your hand for 1 of the Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards from your deck. Show both cards to your opponent. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Scoop Up
rules: Choose 1 of your Pokémon in play and return its Basic Pokémon card to your hand. (Discard all cards attached to that card.)
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: The Boss's Way
rules: Search your deck for an Evolution card with Dark in its name. Show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Challenge!
rules: You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Retrieval
rules: Put up to 2 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Bill
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Mysterious Fossil
rules: You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Potion
rules: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.
